Articles.Content:
Indeed, KSP 0.23 release and the end-year celebrations is no good time to make any progress on such things.

I admit though I can't wait to get hands on what Bobcat is being working on... looks definitely tremendous!

The panels look brilliant.

Edited December 27, 2013 by roscosmos

I'm a little surprised to say that for a moment I actually thought this was a picture of the new BobCat Soyuz superimposed over a picture of Mir. I figured it out pretty quickly but I'm still impressed. I guess BobCat's new textures bring the Soyuz even closer to the real thing than I thought.

I'm a little surprised to say that for a moment I actually thought this was a picture of the new BobCat Soyuz superimposed over a picture of Mir. I figured it out pretty quickly but I'm still impressed. I guess BobCat's new textures bring the Soyuz even closer to the real thing than I thought.

I wasn't sure which one was which, either. BTW, check that guys name out. Most likely just an impersonator, but in a forum like this, you never know.
Im very busy in IRL work and no have tima to make anything. )) Year end no good time to make addons.
Unfortunately just an impersonator, I wish I did work for Roscosmos though.

Unfortunately just an impersonator, I wish I did work for Roscosmos though.

Really? Was it fun, and if so, what did you do?
He said he is just an Impersonator and he WISH that he would have worked for Roscosmos , not that he actually did (well at least I would guess that this is what he means)

He said he is just an Impersonator and he WISH that he would have worked for Roscosmos , not that he actually did (well at least I would guess that this is what he means)

Well, I must learn how to readÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
happy new year 2 days earlier 8P
Happy Hogmany to you too
I dont think the N1 is supposed to be doing this but it looks cool

Happy Hogmany to you too

Hogmanay, but thanks for playing.
Hey bobcat, will you make the new core stage for the Soyuz 2-1V when you get back from your sabbatical/break/whatever you do in Russia?
I think that it could be useful, with added boosters, for more realistic Kliper launches. Though I'd rather see a 3rd stage with an RD-0124 instead of RD-0110. That one is already flying.

Soyuz 2 ? I think maybe, why not.

Now im work in update old project and wait new ECLSS version.

Well, I'm really looking forward to any new updates. If there's anything I could help you with, just mail/PM me. I'd love to test-run your new stuff.

BTW, any new screenshots? Also, what do you think about my suggestion for MIR core update? I posted it a few pages back.
Also, any news on HOME 2? I found a way to fit some HOME Pods into a Soyuz well enough for me, and I remember you saying that A HOME 2 is soon.
Quick question: is there a reason that the engines in the Soviet Engines Pack show up in the editor catalog with shrouds on them? Would be nice to see the engine itself in the thumbnail.

ChronicSilence

Good idea.

Update to version 1.1.
Did you check the last RealFuels release? Quite a lot has changed, included LiquidFuel being replaced with Kerosene.
Anyone else have a problem where you cannot open a .craft file in the VAB because it says "locked or invalid parts". Searched on the thread but i couldnt find any fix.

Anyone else have a problem where you cannot open a .craft file in the VAB because it says "locked or invalid parts". Searched on the thread but i couldnt find any fix.

That's what happens when you play the campaign mode, and either the parts are not researched yet, or are not in the research tree.

If they are supposed to be in the tree, go back to the research center, find the parts, and "buy" them. Yep, you gotta do that when you add stuff to the tree.
Which files are you talking about? It can also happen in sandbox if some parts are broken or removed.

That's what happens when you play the campaign mode, and either the parts are not researched yet, or are not in the research tree.

If they are supposed to be in the tree, go back to the research center, find the parts, and "buy" them. Yep, you gotta do that when you add stuff to the tree.

Which files are you talking about? It can also happen in sandbox if some parts are broken or removed.

It happens in sandbox mode, the Buran, Ares 1 and Ares V wont load, all the others are ok. I have downloaded twice from spaceport and unzipped using two different programs so I doubt it is an installation problem unless you can think of anything else.
